job.remarks: LVE 2021-06-15 Create new empty document with UPS Track and Trace no Or Create POD PDF from SSRS Update existing POD document with POD PDF file Create new document with POD PDF file

step.datasource:
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD] ([EOrhkrgId] ,[EOrderNumber] ,[EShippingNumber] ,[EShipmentDate] ,[EDebtor] ,[EShippingDebtor] ,[EShippingType] ,[EShippingDescription])
select o.ID, o.ordernr, o.pakbon_nr, o.pakbon_dat, o.debnr, o.verzdebnr, l.levwijze, l.oms40_0 from [400]..orhkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join [400]..ordlev l with (NOLOCK) on o.levwijze = l.levwijze where o.pakbon_dat between DATEADD(DAY,-115,GETDATE()) AND DATEADD(DAY,-1,GETDATE()) AND ord_soort = 'V' AND o.levwijze IN ('149', '150','249', '250') AND o.ID NOT IN (SELECT [EOrhkrgId] FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD]) ORDER by o.pakbon_nr
UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD] SET UPODReady = 1 WHERE EShipmentDate < DATEADD(DAY,-5,GETDATE()) and UPODReady = 0

UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD] SET UPSPODChecked = 0, sysmodified = GETDATE(), URetry += 1 WHERE UPSstatus = 'Error' and UPODReady = 1 and UPSPODChecked = 1 and URetry <= 3 and sysmodified < DATEADD(day,-2,getdate()) and EShipmentDate > DATEADD(day,-120,getdate())

UPDATE TOP (10) p WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET abei_runid = '%runid%' , abei_rowstatus = 1 , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD] p INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.cicmpy c WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.debnr = RIGHT(SPACE(6) + LTRIM(RTRIM(p.EDebtor COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT)), 6) -- indexed with space, speeds up query WHERE 1=1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.BacoDiscussions b WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND b.Type = 222 -- UPS POD (custom) AND b.OrderNumber = p.EOrderNumber AND b.CmpWwn = c.cmp_wwn AND b.OurRef = p.EShippingNumber -- per delivery 1 POD )
AND ISNULL(p.abei_rowstatus, 0) = 0 AND p.UTracking IS NOT NULL -- Track and Trace code available

SELECT c.cmp_wwn as cmpwwn , p.EOrderNumber as OrderNumber , 222 as Type , CONCAT('POD ', p.EShippingNumber, ' ', p.UTracking) as Subject , p.UTracking as Note , p.EShippingNumber as Ourref FROM [dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD] p WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy c WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.debnr = RIGHT(SPACE(6) + LTRIM(RTRIM(p.EDebtor COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT)), 6) -- indexed with space, speeds up query WHERE 1=1 AND p.abei_runid = '%runid%'

UPDATE p WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET abei_rowstatus = CASE WHEN doc.ID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 2 END -- not found = retry next time , abei_PODID = doc.ID , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD] p INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.cicmpy c WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.debnr = RIGHT(SPACE(6) + LTRIM(RTRIM(p.EDebtor COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT)), 6) -- indexed with space, speeds up query OUTER APPLY ( SELECT TOP (1) b.ID FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.BacoDiscussions b WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND b.Type = 222 -- UPS POD (custom) AND b.OrderNumber = p.EOrderNumber AND b.CmpWwn = c.cmp_wwn AND b.OurRef = p.EShippingNumber -- per delivery 1 POD ) doc
WHERE 1=1 AND p.abei_runid = '%runid%'
step.stepname: Check if document exists and update status

step.datasource: UPDATE TOP (10) p WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET abei_runid = '%runid%' , abei_PODstatus = 1 , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD] p INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.cicmpy c WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.debnr = RIGHT(SPACE(6) + LTRIM(RTRIM(p.EDebtor COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT)), 6) -- indexed with space, speeds up query WHERE 1=1 AND ISNULL(p.abei_PODstatus, 0) = 0
step.stepname: Check if there are new lines with complete POD info

step.datasource: SELECT p.EShippingNumber FROM [dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD] p WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND p.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND p.abei_PODstatus = 1

SELECT CONCAT('C:\APPS\ABEI\Temp\UPSPOD\%RUNID%\', p.EShippingNumber, '.pdf') as FileName , p.abei_PODID as ID FROM [dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD] p WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND p.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND p.abei_PODstatus = 1 AND p.abei_PODID IS NOT NULL -- POD already exists

SELECT CONCAT('C:\APPS\ABEI\Temp\UPSPOD\%RUNID%\', p.EShippingNumber, '.pdf') as FileName , c.cmp_wwn as cmpwwn , p.EOrderNumber as OrderNumber , 222 as Type , CONCAT('POD ', p.EShippingNumber, ' ', p.UTracking) as Subject , p.UTracking as Note , p.EShippingNumber as Ourref FROM [dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD] p WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy c WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.debnr = RIGHT(SPACE(6) + LTRIM(RTRIM(p.EDebtor COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT)), 6) -- indexed with space, speeds up query WHERE 1=1 AND p.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND p.abei_PODstatus = 1 AND p.abei_PODID IS NULL -- POD does not exist

UPDATE p WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET abei_PODstatus = CASE WHEN b.Document IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 2 END -- not found = retry next time , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD] p INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.BacoDiscussions b WITH (NOLOCK) ON b.ID = p.abei_PODID WHERE 1=1 AND p.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND p.abei_PODstatus = 1 AND p.abei_PODID IS NOT NULL
UPDATE p WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET abei_PODstatus = ISNULL(doc.s, 0) , abei_rowstatus = ISNULL(doc.s, 0) , abei_PODID = doc.ID , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD] p INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.cicmpy c WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.debnr = RIGHT(SPACE(6) + LTRIM(RTRIM(p.EDebtor COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT)), 6) -- indexed with space, speeds up query OUTER APPLY ( SELECT TOP (1) b.ID, CASE WHEN b.Document IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 2 END as s FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.BacoDiscussions b WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND b.Type = 222 -- UPS POD (custom) AND b.OrderNumber = p.EOrderNumber AND b.CmpWwn = c.cmp_wwn AND b.OurRef = p.EShippingNumber -- per delivery 1 POD ) doc
WHERE 1=1 AND p.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND p.abei_PODstatus = 1 AND p.abei_PODID IS NULL
step.stepname: Check if document exists and update status

step.datasource: SELECT abei_PODID AS ID FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_UPS_POD] where abei_PODID is NOT NULL
